TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ViewStateModeByIdAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ViewStateModeByIdAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ViewStateModeByIdAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义元数据特性，ASP.NET 服务器控件使用此特性来指定是否参与根据 加载视图状态信息。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that ASP.NET server controls use to specify whether they participate in loading view-state information by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于指定的控件要求通过视图状态加载。The class is used to specify a control that requires view-state loading by . 默认视图状态加载行为是 asp.net 按其索引页的管理树中加载的控件的视图状态信息。The default view-state loading behavior is for ASP.NET to load the view-state information for a control by its index in the control tree of the page. 用于加载视图状态信息的性能开销因为加载其视图状态信息之前，具体而言，必须进行页控件树搜索控件。There is a performance cost for loading view-state information by because the page control tree must be searched for the control specifically before loading its view-state information. 如果类用作自定义控件类的元数据属性If the class is used as a metadata attribute of a custom control class, 的控件的属性返回`true`。the property of the control returns `true`. 如果类未使用，的控件的属性返回其默认值为`false`，这意味着控件不会加载由其视图状态信息。If the class is not used, the property of the control returns its default value of `false`, which means that the control does not load its view-state information by . 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). 类不适用于保存控件的视图状态信息。The class does not apply to saving the view-state information for a control. 类元数据特性是仅在类声明中有效。The class metadata attribute is valid only on class declarations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用到控件类意味着控件将具有由加载其视图状态信息。Applying the to a control class means that the control will have its view-state information loaded by .
